page.title: 01SUMMARY OF AREA AS A WHOLE
page.content: This area is very rural and peaceful with only one shop. There are two churches and about 14 or 15 farms with quiet country lanes connecting them. There are very friendly people here who will always talk and help you. There is only one school but very nice at that. There is one garage which always helps you and your car out of any trouble. There is a track leading to a chalk pit from which you can get a lovely view. Every house has a splendid view out on to some field or down some lane. There is only one pub called "The Gaggle of Geese" and there is a friendly atmosphere whenever you go in.{Buckland Newton} is the only village but there are little hamlets.These are{Duntish, {Brockhampton Green}and{Beaulieu Wood.
